Umakku nam (mihrajil) kanpitta katciyum, capikkappatta (kalli) marattai (atu marumaiyil pavikalin unavena) kur'anil nam kuriyiruppatum manitarkalai cotippatarkakave tavira verillai. (Napiye! Nam vetanaiyaip parri) nam avarkalaip payamuruttuvatu (avarkalutaiya) perum attuliyattaiye avarkalukku atikarikkac ceykiratu
